Text.Value: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*
Why did the killer want Lorgan?
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
How do I find these tunnels?
Fists... After me... Needed to hide...
Were you alone when you died?
Tunnels... Beneath temple... Hidden from sight...
Never... He was... Kinder than most...
What were you protecting Lorgan from?
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
*The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*
Concealed buttons... Lorgan opened for me...

Synopsis: SwD with Brilgor, tiefling refugee that was killed by the serial killer.
